Package org.ginsim.core.graph.view

Interface EdgeAttributesReader<V,​E extends Edge<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - vertex
    E - the edge
    All Superinterfaces:
    AttributesReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EdgeAttributeReaderImpl
    public interface EdgeAttributesReader<V,​E extends Edge<V>>
extends AttributesReader
    graphic info on an edge. this extension of the GsGraphManager is used to get or change visual info on edges objects. It can also change default value (but they aren't persistant yet).

        boolean hasReverseEdge()
        Check if the graph also contains the reversed edge.
        Returns:
